title: mAdhava mAyA
sahitya:
mAdhava mAyA mAnava rUpa vAsudEva mathurApuri nAyaka


anupallavi

  yAdava kuladIpa rAdhA manOhara yashOdA nayana sudhAkara murahara 


caraNam 1    nanda kumArA gOvinda dayAkara brndAvana cara kanakAmbaradhara
  caraNam 2    dIna janAvana turudakara kankaNa dEvakI nandana bhaktha parAyaNa
  caraNam 3    shrI madhusUdana gOpikA ramaNa rAmadAsa vanditha muraLIdhara
